com.hf.fundamental.controller

Class ViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hf.fundamental.controller.ViewController

  • public class ViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    The ViewController class sets a map containing the instances of the Views , then it controls whenever a View may be close and reopens it when required
    Author:
    Favio
